title: LTU_btc
author: LTU_btc
content: On 12th May in Tampere and Riga Ice Hockey World Championship will begin. 16 teams in 2 groups will play. One of hosts - Finland is reigning Champions. While Slovenia and Hungary got promoted from lower division. Most of teams don't have their birghtest stars because of ongoing NHL playoffs. Here is outright odds for tournament winners. Nothing new, Finland, Sweden and Canada is main favorites to win.

comments.author: TopTort777
comments.body: Looks like it has become popular to run tournaments in several countries. IIHF today, FIFA World Cup in Canada, US and Mexico. Amazing that tournament is hosted again in Riga and Tampere, as these two hosted 2021 and 2022 tournaments  Lucky locals, they have huge chances to watch IIHF live.As pictures shows, my predictions are the following, from both groups first 4 teams gonna advance to play-off. It wont be a surprise if teams Canada, USA, Finland and Sweden are the strongest, but I am gonna focus more on Switzerland and Germany. These two happens to surprise me with their games from year to year.

comments.author: LTU_btc
comments.body: Quote from: TopTort777 on May 12, 2023, 12:24:02 PMLooks like it has become popular to run tournaments in several countries. IIHF today, FIFA World Cup in Canada, US and Mexico. Amazing that tournament is hosted again in Riga and Tampere, as these two hosted 2021 and 2022 tournaments  Lucky locals, they have huge chances to watch IIHF live.As pictures shows, my predictions are the following, from both groups first 4 teams gonna advance to play-off. It wont be a surprise if teams Canada, USA, Finland and Sweden are the strongest, but I am gonna focus more on Switzerland and Germany. These two happens to surprise me with their games from year to year. It's already common thing to held IIHF to hold championship in tow different countries, probably it's a bit cheaper for hosts. I read that tickets is quite expensive in Riga, despite that there was many spectators in arena. I agree with your predictions more or less, usually group stage is just warm up for big teams. While teams on two lowest lines is going to fight to avoid relegation.Opening day was interesting. Sweden had difficult match against Germany and scored their only goal just in 3rd period. Bad day for hosts, Latvia had no chance against Canada, while USA made an upset by beating Finland. In 1st period of Czechia - Slovakia we saw 5 goals, but there was not much action in 2nd and 3rd periods and no goals were scored.Friday results and schedule for Saturday:

comments.author: TopTort777
comments.body: I looks like until play-off game starts, there will be low interest to this tournament. So far there were no big news (despite team Hungary managed to make one goal against USA  probably their first goal against such strong team in their history) . Only team USA outplayed champions, team Finland 4-1, but these are only preliminary stage, so everything is still in future. Btw, if a team bets strongest team in prelims, they always lose to them in play-off.

And hosts Latvia achieved their ever win against Czechia in World Championship, they won after OT 4:3.It's sad to see Germany still with 0 points after 3 games because all their games with favorites wree really good.

But I would not call it "team Latvia" is strong at this tournament. comments.author: TopTort777
comments.body: Why this topic is so silent ? Nobody watches IIHF or likes ice hockey? Or current championship isnt interesting? Well you have missed some good games. For example do you know team Canada is in two looses streak right now ? Loss to Switzerland - this is accepted. And a loss to Norway. That is something unexpected. Two straight losses in prelims is rare for Canada. Also finishing on third place in group is something rare to see.

After Slovakia win Latvia needed point in this game, while win in extra time moves them to 3rd place already, while Czech Republic is just 4th.In other group game for 1st place between Sweden and USA also ended in extra time where USA won. While Slovenia and Hungary finished last and going down just after one year in top division. They will be replaced by Italy and Poland.Final standings of groups and playoffs pairs:

comments.author: TopTort777
comments.body: Latvia vs Switzerland yesterdays game was amazing. Never seen Latvia having 5 win streak in ice hockey  Magic of prelims, Latvia lost to Canada (a disaster game), Canada lost to Switzerland, Switzerland lost to Latvia  I think Latvia won because the game was in their homeland. Fan support made that 4:3 happen. Because usually for team Latvia, it is loosing most of games in prelims, having a draw or beating one strong team, and that is it, no more power to continue playing. And now they are in play-off. P.S. I have noticed that forum members are not interested in ice hockey at all. No matter if this is Olympic games, NHL or IIHF, topics are usually empty.

comments.author: TopTort777
comments.body: Anyone wants to discuss Joe Veleno more ? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sJHy3NoXfW0 <-- here is what I am talking about. I think even in MMA such more arent allowed. Good that players have protection on that part of the body. What about that slight elbow to face connection? Veleno was first to start aggression, got hit slightly to face, and felt down like a football player  We dont need hockey like that!

comments.body: Quote from: TopTort777 on May 25, 2023, 11:10:53 AMAnyone wants to discuss Joe Veleno more ? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sJHy3NoXfW0 <-- here is what I am talking about. Veleno was first to start aggression, got hit slightly to face, and felt down like a football player  We dont need hockey like that! Wow! I don't think that I have ever seen a move like that. It's true that hockey players have protection on that part of the leg, but a player should be penalized for a move like that. And I'm not saying about 2 minute penalization but an extra penalization after the game so that he never again think of doing something like that. And that dive when Niederreiter touched him is something you see on football games, not ice hockey.

comments.author: TopTort777
comments.body: He received 5 game suspension for that move. For him, this tournament is over, as there are exactly 5 games were left after team Canada vs team Switzerland game. 5 game suspension is a fair penalty. He could have got 5 min penalty, and that is nothing. Or 5+25 and miss the rest of the game, but that also would be soft for such misconduct. So sending him home was a good decision. Sadly, he would get a medal anyway, because he was in teams roster the moment tournament has started.

Two games already started and later we have two more. Germany is currently leading 1-0 against Switzerland but I'll be surprised if they manage to win the game. I think that USA, Switzerland and Canada will qualify for the semi final, but I'm not who to pick between Sweden and Latvia.

comments.author: LTU_btc
comments.body: Wow, what Latvia did is incredible. They were huge underdogs against Sweden, but managed to win with amazing support in Arena Riga. In 2nd period Sweden got 5 minutes power play, but even that didn't helped them to score. So, Latvia will play for medals for the first time ever, big congratulations to neighbours. It's only sad that championship leaves Riga, I think that fans were huge factor for Latvia that helped them.They will face Canada in semifinal who won quite easy against Finland. It's also a bit unexpected, because Finland were favored a bit.Germany made big upset by eliminating Switzerland. Germany hgad some bad luck in start of championship, loosing 3 games by 1 goal, but now they're looking very solid. Their opponents will be USA who didn't had big problems against Czechia. I saw interesting fact on Twitter that last time USA won World Championship only in 1933. I didn't believed until I checked myself.

comments.author: TopTort777
comments.body: Amazing game by Latvia. I think they are on huge hype after beating Switzerland, so yesterday their team spirit was like 200%, and with support of fans (I've read that here were only about 500 Swedish fans), they have managed to create a miracle yesterday. That is their highest achievement in history. And it seems that tomorrow their luck will end, as they gonna face Canada, who already beat them 6-0. Also there will not much help from fans, as finals are going to be in Finland.
